build.buildCommand: composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader && npm install && npm run build

deploy.startCommand: php artisan storage:link && php artisan db:seed --class=AdminUserSeeder --force && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=$PORT
deploy.preDeployCommand: php artisan permission:cache-reset && php artisan cache:clear && php artisan config:clear && php artisan route:clear && php artisan view:clear
